plugger = {}
-- Semantic versioning (http://semver.org) do local V_MAJOR, V_MINOR, V_BUGFIX = 1, 0, 0 local SEMVER = string.format("%d.%d.%d", V_MAJOR, V_MINOR, V_BUGFIX)
plugger.__VERSION_MAJOR = V_MAJOR plugger.__VERSION_MINOR = V_MINOR plugger.__VERSION_BUGFIX = V_BUGFIX plugger.__VERSION = SEMVER end
plugger.path = function(subdir) if not subdir then subdir = "" else subdir = subdir:gsub("%.", "\\") if subdir:sub(#subdir) ~= "\\" then subdir = subdir .. "\\" end end
return GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 20) .. subdir end
-- fix the lua path do local path = utils.split(package.path, ";") path[1] = plugger.path() .. "?.lua" table.insert(path, 2, plugger.path() .. "libraries\\?.lua") table.insert(path, 3, plugger.path() .. "libraries\\?\\init.lua") package.path = table.concat(path, ";")
local cpath = utils.split(package.cpath, ";") cpath[1] = plugger.path() .. "?.dll" table.insert(cpath, 2, plugger.path() .. "libraries\\?.dll") package.cpath = table.concat(cpath, ";") end
require("scripts.main")
